title: Decreto Legislativo 3 aprile 2006 n. 152 - Norme in materia ambientale
summary: Consolidated framework for EIA, soil, water, waste, and air. Engineers must verify project adherence to technical annexes for emission limits.

title: Directive 2008/98/EC on waste
summary: Sets the basic concepts and definitions related to waste management. Requires engineers to implement the waste hierarchy in industrial design.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2012/18/UE (Seveso III)
summary: Governs control of major-accident hazards involving dangerous substances. Engineers must prepare safety reports and internal emergency plans.

title: Linee guida per l'autorizzazione degli impianti alimentati da fonti rinnovabili
summary: National guidelines for the Single Authorization (Autorizzazione Unica) of renewable plants. Defines technical siting criteria for engineers.

title: Regulation (EC) No 1907/2006 concerning REACH
summary: Regulates the registration, evaluation, and authorization of chemicals. Chemical engineers must ensure all substances used in processes are registered.

title: Codice dei beni culturali e del paesaggio
summary: Regulates landscape protection and cultural heritage. Site engineers must obtain landscape authorization for works in restricted areas.

title: Legge Regionale 12 dicembre 2003 n. 26 - Disciplina dei servizi locali
summary: Lombardy's regulation on local water and waste services. Engineers must follow regional technical standards for wastewater discharge.

title: Legge Regionale 6 agosto 2007 n. 13 - Piano Energetico Regionale
summary: Defines the energy strategy and efficiency targets for the Lazio region. Building engineers must align with regional thermal insulation standards.

title: Disposizioni in materia di acque e rifiuti
summary: Reorganizes the integrated management of waste and water in Sicily. Requires engineers to integrate regional logistics into waste plans.

title: Norme sulla gestione dei rifiuti nella Regione Campania
summary: Specific rules for Campania focusing on remediation of contaminated sites. Engineers must coordinate with ARPAC for site characterization.

title: Directive 2010/75/EU on industrial emissions
summary: Regulates pollution from large industrial installations using BAT (Best Available Techniques). Engineers must reference BREF documents.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2009/28/CE sulla promozione dell'uso dell'energia da fonti rinnovabili
summary: Sets targets and incentive schemes for renewable energy production. Engineers must verify eligibility for GSE incentives.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2012/27/UE sull'efficienza energetica
summary: Mandates energy audits for large enterprises. Industrial engineers must perform audits every 4 years to ensure compliance.

title: Norme per la tutela dell'ambiente
summary: Historical regional framework for Veneto, including noise and air pollution controls. Engineers must check for local tighter limits.

title: Disposizioni in materia di valutazione di impatto ambientale
summary: Specific procedures for EIA within the Piedmont region. Engineers must handle regional screening requests via the dedicated portal.

title: Individuazione dei rifiuti non pericolosi sottoposti a procedure semplificate
summary: Technical standards for the recovery of non-hazardous waste. Engineers use this for designing secondary raw material processes.

title: Regolamento recante modifiche al D.M. 5 febbraio 1998
summary: Technical updates for specific waste categories like construction and demolition waste. Essential for civil and environmental engineers.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2012/19/UE sui RAEE
summary: Governs the management of waste electrical and electronic equipment. Systems engineers must design for end-of-life recovery.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2006/66/CE relativa a pile e accumulatori
summary: Rules for the disposal and recycling of batteries. Mechanical/Electrical engineers must ensure product labeling and take-back compliance.

title: Regolamento sulla disciplina delle terre e rocce da scavo
summary: Defines when excavated soil is a byproduct rather than waste. Geotechnical engineers must draft 'Piani di Utilizzo' (Usage Plans).

title: Regolamento recante criteri semplificati per la bonifica dei punti vendita carburante
summary: Simplified remediation procedures for petrol stations. Remediation engineers use these standards for faster site closure.

title: Directive 2000/60/EC establishing a framework for Water Policy
summary: Requires achieving 'good status' for all water bodies. Hydraulic engineers must design based on River Basin Management Plans.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 98/83/CE relativa alla qualità delle acque destinate al consumo umano
summary: Technical limits for substances in drinking water. Water treatment engineers must ensure plant output meets these parameters.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2006/7/CE relativa alla gestione della qualità delle acque di balneazione
summary: Monitoring and classification of bathing water. Coastal engineers use this for discharge impact assessments.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2008/50/CE relativa alla qualità dell'aria
summary: Establishes limit values for pollutants like PM10 and NOx. Urban planners and engineers must model air impacts for new infrastructure.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2015/2193 sui medi impianti di combustione
summary: Emission limits for medium combustion plants (1-50 MW). Plant engineers must ensure boiler compliance and registration.

title: Criteri per la qualifica di sottoprodotti
summary: Provides legal certainty for identifying by-products vs waste. Engineers must document 'certainty of use' and technical requirements.

title: Regolamento dell'Autorizzazione Unica Ambientale (AUA)
summary: Simplifies environmental permits for SMEs by merging 7 previous authorizations. Engineers must manage the unified application process.

title: Regolamento dello Sportello Unico per le Attività Produttive (SUAP)
summary: Establishes the digital point of contact for all production-related permits. Engineers must use the SUAP portal for environmental filings.

title: Norme per la gestione dei rifiuti
summary: Regional management plan and objectives for Tuscany. Engineers must align with the specific regional waste tracking requirements.

title: Disposizioni in materia di tutela e uso del suolo
summary: Regulations for soil use and prevention of desertification in Puglia. Civil engineers must assess soil stability and hydrogeological risk.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2002/91/CE sull'efficienza energetica in edilizia
summary: Mandates the Energy Performance Certificate (APE). HVAC engineers must calculate building energy classes based on these standards.

title: Applicazione delle metodologie di calcolo delle prestazioni energetiche
summary: The 'Requisiti Minimi' decree for NZEB (Nearly Zero Energy Buildings). Building engineers must meet these technical thresholds.

title: Directive 2012/27/EU on energy efficiency
summary: Framework for reaching EU energy savings targets. Engineers must integrate energy management systems (ISO 50001).

title: Disciplina di attuazione della direttiva 2014/94/UE sulla realizzazione di una infrastruttura per i combustibili alternativi
summary: Rules for electric charging stations and LNG/CNG infrastructure. Electrical engineers must design charging hubs according to these standards.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi (CAM) per l'edilizia
summary: Mandatory green public procurement criteria for construction projects. Engineers must select materials with specific environmental certifications.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi (CAM) per l'illuminazione pubblica
summary: Technical standards for energy-efficient street lighting. Lighting engineers must follow these for municipal tenders.

title: Directive 2002/49/EC relating to the assessment and management of environmental noise
summary: Requires noise mapping and action plans. Acoustical engineers must use EU-standard software for noise modeling.

title: Legge quadro sull'inquinamento acustico
summary: Sets emission and immission limits for acoustic pollution. Engineers must perform impact assessments (Previsionale di Impatto Acustico).

title: Determinazione dei valori limite delle sorgenti sonore
summary: Defines the technical decibel limits for different urban zones. Crucial for engineers designing factories or infrastructure near residential areas.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2002/49/CE relativa alla determinazione del rumore ambientale
summary: Translates EU noise mapping requirements into Italian law for roads, railways, and airports.

title: Testo unico sulla salute e sicurezza sul lavoro
summary: General safety and health at work, including environmental risks in the workplace. Site engineers (CSE/CSP) must ensure compliance.

title: Approvazione di norme tecniche di prevenzione incendi
summary: The 'RTO' for fire safety. Fire engineers must use this performance-based approach for building compliance.

title: Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 on classification labeling and packaging (CLP)
summary: Standardizes the labeling of hazardous substances. Engineers must ensure SDS (Safety Data Sheets) are correctly managed.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2006/118/CE sulla protezione delle acque sotterranee
summary: Sets quality standards for groundwater and prevents pollution from hazardous substances. Essential for remediation and well engineers.

title: Disposizioni sulla tutela delle acque dall'inquinamento
summary: Preceded D.Lgs 152/2006. Many technical standards were carried over into the new code.

title: Regolamento recante norme tecniche per il riutilizzo delle acque reflue
summary: Technical requirements for reusing treated wastewater in agriculture or industry. Engineers must ensure disinfection levels.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 1999/31/CE relativa alle discariche di rifiuti
summary: Technical standards for design and management of landfills. Civil engineers must include multi-layer liner systems.

title: Definizione dei criteri di ammissibilità dei rifiuti in discarica
summary: Establishes the limit values for leachable substances in waste for landfill acceptance. Requires lab testing by engineers.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2000/53/CE relativa ai veicoli fuori uso
summary: Management of end-of-life vehicles. Automotive engineers must design for easier dismantling.

title: Disciplina dei centri di raccolta dei rifiuti urbani
summary: Technical design requirements for municipal waste centers (Centri di Raccolta). Municipal engineers must follow floor waterproofness rules.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2008/99/CE sulla tutela penale dell'ambiente
summary: Introduces environmental crimes into the administrative liability of entities (231 model). Engineers must document compliance to avoid liability.

title: Disposizioni in materia di delitti contro l'ambiente
summary: Introduces specific environmental felonies into the Penal Code (e.g., 'Inquinamento Ambientale'). Critical for corporate risk management.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per i servizi di pulizia
summary: Standards for detergents and cleaning services in public buildings. Facilities engineers must verify product toxicity.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per l'affidamento del servizio di gestione del verde pubblico
summary: Sustainability standards for public parks and plant nurseries. Agronomists and civil engineers must follow these for public tenders.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per calzature e prodotti tessili
summary: Standards for public procurement of uniforms and textiles. Industrial engineers must check chemical restrictions.

title: Regulation (EU) No 517/2014 on fluorinated greenhouse gases
summary: Rules to contain and reduce emissions of F-gases. Refrigeration engineers must have specific certifications for handling.

title: Attuazione del regolamento (UE) 517/2014 sui gas fluorurati
summary: National database and certification system for F-gas operators. Engineers must register all maintenance activities.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2009/29/CE che modifica la direttiva 2003/87/CE (ETS)
summary: Emission Trading System rules for CO2 quotas. Energy engineers must monitor and report annual plant emissions.

title: Regolamento concernente l'attuazione dell'articolo 11-quaterdecies della legge 248/2005
summary: Standards for plant installation inside buildings. Electrical and thermal engineers must issue the Declaration of Conformity (DiCo).

title: Regolamento recante definizione dei criteri generali in materia di esercizio e manutenzione degli impianti termici
summary: Rules for boiler inspections and efficiency checks. Maintenance engineers must update the 'Libretto di Impianto'.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2006/42/CE relativa alle macchine
summary: Safety requirements for machinery. Mechanical engineers must ensure CE marking and technical file preparation.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2004/108/CE relativa alla compatibilità elettromagnetica
summary: Standards for preventing electromagnetic interference. Electronic engineers must test equipment emissions and immunity.

title: Requisiti dei luoghi di lavoro
summary: Detailed technical requirements for lighting, ventilation, and workspace dimensions. Building engineers must consult this during design.

title: Regolamento relativo alla verifica degli impianti di messa a terra
summary: Mandates periodic inspections of electrical earthing systems. Safety engineers must schedule 2 or 5-year checks.

title: Revisione delle tariffe incentivanti per la produzione di energia elettrica da impianti solari
summary: Updated feed-in tariffs and incentives for solar PV. PV engineers use this for economic feasibility studies.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2014/52/UE sulla valutazione dell'impatto ambientale
summary: Updates the EIA procedure, introducing the 'Provvedimento Unico Ambientale'. Engineers must manage more complex public consultations.

title: Standard tecnici per la gestione dei fanghi di depurazione
summary: Technical limits for heavy metals and pathogens in sewage sludge for land application. Wastewater engineers must monitor quality.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2018/851 che modifica la direttiva 2008/98/CE
summary: Updates the waste code to include circular economy targets. Engineers must track recycling efficiency rates.

title: Regolamento recante criteri per la qualifica di sottoprodotti
summary: Operational criteria to avoid classification as waste for industrial residues. Production engineers must draft the technical dossier.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2003/87/CE per lo scambio di quote di emissioni
summary: First implementation of ETS in Italy. Replaced by later versions but defined initial monitoring zones.

title: Disciplina dell'imballaggio in materia di igiene e sanità
summary: The master regulation for materials in contact with food (MOCA). Material engineers must test for migration limits.

title: Regulation (EU) No 10/2011 on plastic materials intended to come into contact with food
summary: Specific rules for plastic food packaging. Packaging engineers must ensure PIM (Plastic Implementation Measure) compliance.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2009/71/Euratom sulla sicurezza nucleare
summary: Rules for managing radioactive waste and nuclear site decommissioning. Nuclear engineers must follow ISIN guidelines.

title: Attuazione della direttiva 2013/59/Euratom sulla protezione contro le radiazioni ionizzanti
summary: Consolidated act for radiation protection. Requires engineers to assess radon risk in workplaces.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per arredi per ufficio
summary: Sustainability criteria for office furniture. Design engineers must verify VOC emissions from wood panels.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per prodotti detergenti
summary: Public procurement rules for professional cleaning products. Chemical engineers must verify biodegradability levels.

title: Schemi di riferimento per la compilazione della relazione tecnica di progetto
summary: Standardizes the format for energy efficiency design reports (Legge 10). HVAC engineers must use these templates.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2018/2001 sulla promozione dell'uso dell'energia da fonti rinnovabili
summary: Updates renewable energy targets and introduces Renewable Energy Communities (CER). Engineers must design for community sharing.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per l'affidamento del servizio di progettazione e lavori di edilizia
summary: Significant update to building CAM including carbon footprint requirements. Structural engineers must use LCAs (Life Cycle Assessments).

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2018/851 sull'imballaggio e i rifiuti di imballaggio
summary: New labeling requirements for environmental disposal. Packaging engineers must include material codes (e.g., PAP 21) on items.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per l'arredo urbano
summary: Sustainability criteria for street benches, bins, and playgrounds. Landscape architects/engineers must prioritize recycled materials.

title: Criteri Ambientali Minimi per i servizi di ristorazione collettiva
summary: Standards for public school/hospital canteens. Process engineers must verify waste reduction technologies in kitchen design.

title: Codice dei contratti pubblici
summary: The new code for public works. Engineers must integrate BIM and sustainability criteria in all public tenders.

title: Codice dei contratti pubblici (Vecchio)
summary: Replaced by the 2023 code, but still applicable for older ongoing tenders.

title: Regolamento per la semplificazione degli adempimenti amministrativi in materia ambientale
summary: Simplifies noise and water reporting for small companies. Engineers use this to avoid full impact reports for low-risk sites.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per i prodotti tessili
summary: Updated standards for textile products in public supply. Includes durability and reparability metrics.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per l'affidamento dei servizi di gestione dei rifiuti
summary: Mandatory for municipal waste collection tenders. Logistics engineers must design routes for optimized fuel consumption.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2018/2002 sull'efficienza energetica
summary: Introduction of more granular energy billing and remote reading for heating systems. Building engineers must specify smart meters.

title: Testo unico delle disposizioni legislative e regolamentari in materia edilizia
summary: Main regulation for building permits (SCIA/CILA). Civil engineers must ensure structural and volumetric compliance.

title: Norme per l'attuazione del Piano energetico nazionale
summary: The foundational law for energy efficiency in buildings. Requires the 'Legge 10' technical report for all new works.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2019/1937 riguardante la protezione delle persone che segnalano violazioni (Whistleblowing)
summary: Requires companies to have reporting channels for environmental violations. Compliance engineers must ensure anonymous channels exist.

title: Regolamento recante norme tecniche per i camini e condotti di evacuazione
summary: Technical design rules for industrial chimneys and flue gas discharge. Engineers must calculate dispersion heights.

title: Prescrizioni relative ai requisiti di efficienza energetica delle caldaie a combustibile liquido o gassoso
summary: Efficiency standards for boilers from 4 to 400 kW. Building engineers must verify the Star-rating of appliances.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per l'acquisto di computer e monitor
summary: Focuses on recycled plastic content and modularity for IT equipment. Procurement engineers must verify EPEAT rankings.

title: Attuazione della direttiva (UE) 2018/849 relativa ai veicoli fuori uso e batterie
summary: Revises the accountability of producers in the automotive sector. Engineers must integrate take-back costs in lifecycle analysis.

title: Incentivazione della produzione di energia elettrica da impianti a fonti rinnovabili diversi dai fotovoltaici
summary: Incentives for wind, hydro, and biomass. Engineers use these for project finance modeling.

title: Promozione dell'uso del biometano nel settore dei trasporti
summary: Grants for upgrading biogas plants to biomethane. Process engineers must design membrane or water scrubbing systems.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per i servizi di lavanderia
summary: Standards for water and energy consumption in industrial laundries. Utility engineers must design for water recycling.

title: Criteri ambientali minimi per l'acquisto di prodotti per l'igiene della persona
summary: The latest CAM for personal care. Engineers must check for microplastic bans in chemical formulations.
